comment.original: I see them as posted by "Guest"; both of them. Till you mentioned that one of the "Guest" posts was yours, I would not have thought it was you. No, I did not think you were applauding yourself - but just wanted to be sure. Yes, Disqus seems to have been "infiltrated" by the 50 cents army, as well as the 30 rubles army on other blogs, just to mess with our liberal, democratic, capitalist, American minds (or what passes for that)...
